text: Charles Darrow (10 August 1889 — 28 August 1967) was one of the founders of Monopoly. == Life == In the 1930s, Charles met Lizzie Maggie, founder of The Landlord’s Game, they played a game of that, and so that Charles Darrow became one of the founders of Monopoly. In 1935, He sold Monopoly to Parker Brothers. Darrow died on 28 August 1967, in Bucks County, Pennsylvania at the age of 78. Category:Businesspeople from Philadelphia Category:1889 births Category:1967 deaths
title: Charles Darrow
